original_text: “O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, the city that kills the prophets and stones those who are sent to it! How often would I have gathered your children together as a hen gathers her brood under her wings, and you were not willing!
korean_text: 예루살렘아 예루살렘아 선지자들을 죽이고 네게 파송된 자들을 돌로 치는 자여 암탉이 그 새끼를 날개 아래에 모음 같이 내가 네 자녀를 모으려 한 일이 몇 번이더냐 그러나 너희가 원하지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: the city that kills the prophets
and stones those who are sent to it!
sentences.korean_translation: 자기에게 보냄을 받은 자들을 돌로 치는구나!

sentences.original_text: How often would I have gathered your children together
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네 자녀를 모으려고 얼마나 자주 하였으랴!

sentences.original_text: as a hen gathers her brood under her wings,
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 암탉이 그 새끼를 날개 아래 모으듯이,
